text: Joey Image (born Joey Poole; 5 March 1957 â€“ 1 June 2020) was an American punk rock drummer. He joined the Misfits in November 1978. He was the drummer for both the "Horror Business" and "Night of the Living Dead" in 1979. He was born in Weehawken, New Jersey. In 2016, he was diagnosed with liver cancer. Image died on 1 June 2020 in Florida from the disease, aged 63.Misfits drummer Joey Image reportedly dead at 63 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Musicians from New Jersey
title: Joey Image
